text: Gülruz Sururi (24 July 1929 – 31 December 2018) was a Turkish actress and author. She presented a TV cooking show and co-owned a theatre. She was born in Istanbull. She was named "The Woman of the Year" by the Turkish Women's Association in 1966. In the 1990s, she presented five years long a cooking show A La Luna in the television channel TRT. Sururi died in Istanbul on 31 December 2018 from bile duct cancer, aged 89. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Turkey Category:Deaths from cholangiocarcinoma Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish television actors Category:Actors from Istanbul Category:Writers from Istanbul
title: Gülriz Sururi
